extendedInfo.description: It's all about the Ride... Each week host Tim Alan and his lovely co-host will bring you all there is to know about the world of motorcycles. From Harley Davidson to Ducati to Honda, with every make and model in between. Dirt Bikes, Cruisers, Racers ... you name it, we'll feature it. You can watch episodes and clips of ASTV for free and you can share them with your friends through Facebook and Twitter. We're all about the passion and experience of motorcycle recreation. We'll bring you tips on maintenance, buying, touring, clubs, events, and more. In America motorcycles is a way of life and ASTV catches the spirit.
